ygData.subject: Re: factions
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a friend that ran a Rogue and was no worse that dubious in ever city but Cabalis.  He also has a Troll that can go in most light cities.  It s a long
ygData.messageBody:
I have a friend that ran a Rogue and was no worse that dubious in
ever city but Cabalis. He also has a Troll that can go in most light
cities. It's a long and hard road to follow, and as has been said
PoK makes it a moot point.

Tuldayen Grimblade
Outrider of Tunare
Terris-Thule, Summoners of the Realm
http://www.magelo.com/eq_view_profile.html?num=761750

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Rickey" <redhawk1974@y...> wrote:
> if you are wanting to do this just for fun be advised it will take
> along time.. I have a 45 iksar beast and have not raised any
> factions and with POP it doesnt matter anymore.. Being KOS is not
> the problem it use to be.. Also your religion can keep you KOS no
> matter how many things you kill.. If you are doing this for fun
> good luck. but its not needed .
>
> Rickey
